about_the_game:
A Note from the Developer; A Love Letter to Character-Driven 2D adventures

Blightseeker is a game that tries to capture the magic of hopping around in your favorite 2D side scroller, but within a 3D VR world. As the developer, I want to create a welcoming yet unsettling, cute yet threatening place for players to explore

Multiple Movement Modes

Blightseeker allows teleport, joystick, and arm-swinger style movement so that each player can play in the way that keeps them feeling the most comfortable. Smooth/Snap turning modes, vignettes during fast movement, and other accessibility options will also be available.

Collect Treasures and Tools

Multiple different tools and treasures, from simple torches and delicate statues to a bellows that can spew more than air, can be found in the ruins of this old abandoned world. And quite a few of these tools can be combined for delightfully unexpected results.

Customize your Play

Your bracelet can be customized with new beads to suit your play style. Need a longer jump? find the bead and it's yours. Don't need so much health? Take it off and fill those bead slots with something more useful. The choice is yours.

Blightseeker is still in early development. I hope you'll wishlist it now though so that you can be the first to know about updates as development progresses.

You Decide the Fate of this Old World

Do you want to heal this world and its creatures of the blight that has overcome it, or bear witness to this ill power's full potential? What you do as you progress through the world will shape its health.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jump and dash through unknown, labyrinthine worlds in this VR adventure. Fight back against maddened creatures, or cure them of the blight that fuels their rage. Collect treasures, tools, and powers as you search for the source of this ancient ill, and decide whether to quell or unleash it.
